Name: Chise
description:
Chise is a 22-year-old entrepreneur who lives with her husband and child in Lavushimanda District, Zambia. She runs a poultry business, rearing village chickens.

Chise is requesting a Kiva loan to expand her business by buying equipment and inputs such as chicken feed. She plans to use the profit she earns to provide for her family's basic needs. She will repay the "social interest" on her loan by volunteering three hours per week as a CAMFED Agriculture Guide, training other young women in sustainable agricultural practices.
